name: Reflect Demo
description:
CONTROLS:

MOVE - arrow keys

SHOOT - z

PARRY - x

FOCUS - shift

controls can be rebound in the options menu.

the bullets with the spinning blue and pink can be parried.

This was the first ever solo game project that I worked on. I tried to make all assets on my own from art and animation to the music, I'm overall very proud of this as my first game. You have unlimited lives so there is no game over state.
